accountSettings.title: Account Settings
accountSettings.description: Manage everything related to your account. From here you can update your password, adjust notification preferences, and review privacy and data settings. Keep your experience secure and tailored to your job search.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: Deleting your account will remove all of your information from our database. This action cannot be undone.

password.error: Please enter your password to proceed.

list_device.logout_all_modal_message_1:
Are you sure you want to log out from all devices?
 If you proceed, your session will be logged out from all devices where you're signed in. You will need to sign in again to access your account.
list_device.logout_single_modal_message_1:
Are you sure you want to log out from <0></0>?
If you proceed, your session will be logged out from <1></1>, but you will remain signed in on other devices.

modal_delete_account.warning_message_1: You are about to permanently delete your account. By executing this action, all data will be lost and this cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to proceed?
